title: Crossing the Red Sea
summary: Exodus 14 tells how Pharaoh changes his mind and pursues the Israelites. God parts the Red Sea through Moses, allowing Israel to cross safely. When the Egyptians follow, the sea returns and drowns them.

faq.question: How did the Israelites escape the Egyptians?
faq.answer: God parted the Red Sea, and they walked through on dry ground.

faq.question: What happened to the Egyptian army?
faq.answer: They were drowned when the sea returned to its normal state.
